TextView.android:text:
This app is a simple project on some basic phrases of some languages(French, Italian, Spanish, Chinese and German Twi).
It works offline.
How it works
The first(Home) page consists of the languages available in the app.
When each one is clicked, it has some basic phrases in it, which when each phrase is clicked, it translates it in the language chosen for you and also writes it below as a pop-up for you.
Aim
This aids in helping you to communicates with someone who speaks the languages in the app.
Thank you...
